summary:
I’m a project manager, and always have been at heart. Though I worked in different sectors and in various positions my responsibilities have revolved around managing projects and people whether as a freelancer or a full-time employee. I have experience as a project manager for more than 7 years in the education, entertainment, culture, and software industries. 

Today I am managing a portfolio of enterprise implementation projects at a SaaS company while leading the Product Department with project managers, product owners, and onboarding specialists. 

I am a curious person who would like to learn every day whether this is related to my career or my hobbies. My skillset includes:

→ Project Management 
→ Stakeholder Management 
→ Change Management 
→ Coaching and leading teams 
→ Organizational Design 
→ Process Improvements 
→ Intercultural Communication

profile_positions.description:
As a Project Implementation Manager at Prioticket, I managed a portfolio of development and implementation projects for enterprise clients. I facilitated and guided the project strategy of the company and create company-wide processes and procedures.  

→ Managed external projects with enterprise clients 
→ Supported the product team with internal projects
→ Led the product team together with the Chief Product Officer 
→ Guided and supported Product Owners for internal planning and yearly product roadmap
→ Promoted and implemented methodologies and new tools to drive efficiency, productivity, and  collaborative thinking
profile_positions.title: Project Implementation Manager

profile_positions.description:
→ Led a team of 12 people at JetBrains Tech Lab 
→ Worked closely with the director of operations to oversee daily business operations
→ Responsible for enforcing company policies and procedures (including being the contact point of the legal team related to contracts, IP and copyright-related discussions, risk assessment, and safety procedures for the work environment)
→ Took a lead in the recruitment and performance review process for the Tech Lab
→ Managed projects and ensured that assignments are carried out as planned
→ Managed relationships with key operations vendors and monitoring orders and supplier relations
profile_positions.title: Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
→ Led the curatorial team of JetBrains Techlab (www.jetbrainstechlab.com) and managed internal and external projects (from planning, implementing, and evaluating) 
→ Took a leading part in research on potential new exhibits and/or technologies
→ Networked with museums, art gallery professionals, and external agencies
→ Involved in giving presentations, leading tours, running workshops, and supervising educational seminars and practical demonstrations
profile_positions.title: Exhibition Curator

profile_positions.description:
→ Developed a new curriculum on intercultural communication for first-year applied university students (event management)
→ Coordinated lectures, seminars, and examination
profile_positions.title: Lecturer of Intercultural Communication

profile_positions.title: Lecturer, American Studies
